column2: BHANGINANDE HIL𞥆AYAANKO𞥅RE JOJ𞥆ANDHE NEDH𞥆ANKE DHEN
Tu𞥅ga𞥄de wonde heftingol horma kala nedh𞥆o e n'der bhesngo nedh𞥆anke e joj𞥆andhe fotudhe woni n’dadh𞥆udi n'dima𞥄gu e potal e jamu e n’der aduna𞥄ru n’dun⹁

Tu𞥅ga𞥄de wonde wa𞥄sugol heftinde kanyaun e salagol tot𞥆ude dhen joj𞥆andhe nedh𞥆o no ad𞥆i masi𞥅bo𞥅ji e sala𞥄re sandolinde e n’der aduna kanyaun e huch𞥆ande aduna𞥄ru n’du nedh𞥆o kala kebhi yaamiro𞥅re ha𞥄lude e mi𞥅ja𞥄deno henanori𞥅 dhum yaonti𞥅 ete kadi yaimbhe poti⹁ jeyade koyae mumen che𞥅rta e kulol e ba𞥄sal sabu a𞥄de𞥅 yaidhde dhun
E tu𞥅ga𞥄de wonde ina tenti yao hak𞥆e𞥅ji a𞥄de𞥅 n'de𞥅nire yaamiro𞥅re la𞥄wdhina𞥄nde n'bele a𞥄de𞥅 wa𞥄sa𞥄 ton𞥆ge𞥅de e gul𞥆ita𞥄gol dowrowol so tawi𞥅 fawa𞥄ma kalfa𞥄ndi ki𞥅sndi wal𞥆a wa𞥄wnere bh urtunde,
E tu𞥅ga𞥄de ina tenti n'de bhamtato𞥅 bhiyangu yaum𞥆a𞥄gu hak𞥆unde leyadhe𞥅le dimdh udhe,

E tu𞥅ga𞥄de e nanondiral leyadhe𞥅le cha𞥄ktangal wo𞥅ndo𞥅re leyadhe𞥅le jowiti𞥅dhe e hak𞥆e𞥅ji gadani a𞥄de𞥅 bayadhi no n'dima𞥄gu, ted𞥆ungal e n'der potal rewbhe e worbhe. Leyadhe𞥅le dhe𞥅 kod𞥆iri𞥅 e darana𞥄de bhamta𞥄re ren𞥆do e nyaibhgol fan𞥆uji n'gu𞥅rndam moyhe𞥆am,
E tu𞥅ga𞥄de e wonde leyadhe𞥅le dentudhe jeyati𞥅dhe dhe𞥅, e bal𞥆ondiral e fed𞥆e leyadhe𞥅le dentudhe jeyadhe koyae mumen pel𞥆iti𞥅 nyai𞥅bhnude horma hak𞥆e𞥅ji a𞥄de kam e n'dima𞥄gu,
E tu𞥅ga𞥄de e bhulngo ren𞥆da𞥄nde n'gam tafde hak𞥆e𞥅ji a𞥄de𞥅 kam e n'dima𞥄gu, leyadhe𞥅le dhe𞥅 tentini𞥅 nafo𞥅re bhurtunde wonde e pel𞥆itgol, ko n'de𞥅n batu n'gu𞥅 nanondiri, hol𞥆iti:

N'gal-dho𞥅 nanondiral win𞥆dere yaan ke𞥅wal jowiti𞥅ngal e hak𞥆e𞥅ji a𞥄de𞥅 wayai ko no la𞥄wol go𞥅tol nyai𞥅 n'gam yaet𞥆a𞥄de leyadhe𞥅teN'bele yaimbhe bhe𞥅 e ren𞥆do𞥅ji dhi𞥅N'badha dhum e hak𞥆il𞥆a𞥄ji mum e kala saha𞥄 kadi et e jan𞥆ginde e nehdeN'bele bhamto𞥅 horma hak𞥆e𞥅l𞥆eji a𞥄de𞥅 e n'dima𞥄guku𞥅le yheet𞥆a𞥄maN'bele sare𞥅 e n'der leyadhe𞥅le, chiyanugol n'gol ina foti fe𞥅nyade, teske𞥅 e yaimbh e fof.
Ku𞥅lal gadanal
In𞥆ama a𞥄de𞥅ji fof poti, n'dimdhidi e jibinan𞥆de to ban𞥆ge hak𞥆e𞥅ji. Ebhe n'go𞥅di mi𞥅jo e hak𞥆ilanta𞥄gal ete ebhe poti hu𞥅fo n'dirde e n'der bh iyanguyaum𞥆a𞥄gu.
Ku𞥅lal 2

Go𞥅to kala ina wa𞥄wi hok𞥆unde ho𞥅re mum hak𞥆e𞥅ji e n'dima gu𞥅ji ka𞥄la𞥄dhi e nanondiralngal tawa ala𞥄 paltagol n'guru,N'bayadi, lenyaol, dhemngal, di𞥅ne, iwdi leyadi wal𞥆a ren𞥆do, danyaal, jibinande wal𞥆a kala n'gonka.

E ko fawti𞥅 he𞥅n haya palto𞥅r go𞥅to wo𞥅data𞥄 e dow yaowita𞥄de e dawrugol, nyaa𞥄wo𞥅re hak𞥆unde leyadhe𞥅le fawa𞥄de e nedh𞥆o um𞥆i𞥅dho leyadi wal𞥆a nedh𞥆o mo yaowita𞥄ki ma𞥄 woni pawidho yaamiro𞥅re la𞥄wdhina𞥄nde wa𞥄wnde wonde fof.
Ku𞥅lal 3
In𞥆ama a𞥄de𞥅 kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e wu𞥅rde, e hak𞥆e n'dim𞥆agu kam e hak𞥆e n'de𞥅nka e kisal ho𞥅re mum.
Ku𞥅lal 4
Haya nedh𞥆o go𞥅to fota𞥄ni ton𞥆ga𞥄de e mach𞥆unga𞥄 gu mach𞥆unga𞥄gu e n'je𞥅yagu a𞥄de𞥅 ko ko harmina𞥄 e no wa𞥄wi si fora𞥄de fof.
Ku𞥅lal 5
Haya nedh𞥆o go𞥅to fota𞥄ni le𞥅pte𞥅de wal𞥆a fiyae𞥅de piyale jaltudhe nedh𞥆a𞥄gu wal𞥆a koyano𞥅je.
Ku𞥅lal 6
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e an𞥆ditire𞥅de nedh𞥆a𞥄gu mum e ka𞥄yaita𞥄ji nyaa𞥄wa𞥄dhi.
Ku𞥅lal 7

YAimbhe fof poti e la𞥄mu ete poti fotde n'de𞥅ndka e yae𞥅so la𞥄mu. YAimbhe fof ina poti fotnde𞥅nde e re𞥅ne𞥅de e he𞥅di he𞥅di ba𞥄wdho yaabh𞥆ude kule n'gal nanondiral yaimbhe fofina poti re𞥅ne𞥅de e to𞥅nyaan𞥆ge tawa ala𞥄 palto𞥅r.
Ku𞥅lal 8
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e wul𞥆ita𞥄de nyaa𞥄wo𞥅re e leyadi mum so tawi𞥅 o ganyaa𞥄ma, o to𞥅nyaa𞥄ma wal𞥆a so hak𞥆e𞥅ji mak𞥆o n'jo𞥅la𞥄ma. dhi𞥅n hak𞥆e𞥅ji ina n'gan𞥆de e la𞥄mu e nyaa𞥄wo𞥅je.
Ku𞥅lal 9
Haya go𞥅to fota𞥄ni nan𞥆ge𞥅de soke𞥅 wal𞥆a yaaltine𞥅 leyadi tawa ko e dowN'ba𞥄wka e bela𞥄dhe.
Ku𞥅lal 10

Nedh𞥆o ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e e hedhe𞥅de e n'der potal e saha𞥄 nyaa𞥄wo𞥅re n'de yaowita𞥄ki, n'de wadhata𞥄 he𞥅di-he𞥅da (jin𞥆gata𞥄). nyaa𞥄wo𞥅bhe bhengu𞥅rota𞥄ko poti nyaa𞥄wde hak𞥆eji fotde𞥅ji nedh𞥆o fof ko tak𞥆a𞥄 ha𞥄 hebh ni dhum nyaa𞥄wore.
Ku𞥅lal 11

Kala nedh𞥆o tu𞥅ma𞥄dho bonan𞥆de ina foti rewe𞥅de ha𞥄 ko fawa𞥄 e mum ko an𞥆de ina wo𞥅di wal𞥆a ala𞥄 tawa ko nyaa𞥄wo𞥅re la𞥄dhin𞥆a𞥄nde n'de su𞥅dha𞥄ka nyaa𞥄wi e tawtingol nyaa𞥄wobhe lu𞥅ndi𞥅bhe he𞥅dbhe ban𞥆ge nyaa𞥄wete𞥅dho o𞥅.

Haya go𞥅to faweta𞥄ke bon𞥆an𞥆de wal𞥆a war n'go tawa n'de wadhate𞥅 n'de𞥅 wa𞥄wa wonde ko te𞥅ngti e mum e yaowita𞥄de e la𞥄wol leyadi wal𞥆a la𞥄wol hak𞥆unde leyadhe𞥅le. Ko no𞥅n ne haya go𞥅to faweta𞥄ke sariyaa badh𞥆o hu𞥅nde tawa n'de wadhete𞥅 n'de𞥅 o jotondira𞥄ni he𞥅n.
Ku𞥅lal 12

Haya go𞥅to yaabh𞥆eta𞥄ke, to𞥅nyae𞥅 e n'der n'gu𞥅rndam mum, e n'der bhesngu mum e n'der jotondiral mum wal𞥆a nedh𞥆a𞥄gu mum lesdhine𞥅, na𞥄nge haya go𞥅to e dowlugol mum pota𞥄ni nyaife𞥅de. Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e re𞥅nane𞥅de dhe𞥅 gedhe te𞥅ngtino𞥅ji n'dima𞥄gumum.
Ku𞥅lal 13
Nedh𞥆o ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e yaahde dho wela𞥄 fof e no welira𞥄 fof kam subha𞥄de hodhan𞥆de mum e n'der leyadi.
Nedh𞥆o ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e yaaltude leyadi kala haya so tawi𞥅 ko n'di mak𞥆o kam e artude e leyadi mum.
Ku𞥅lal 14
E saha𞥄 kulol, nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e yhee𞥅wde mo𞥅la𞥄re e danyade leyadi mo𞥅lndi dhum e godh𞥆e dhe𞥅.
O𞥅 hak𞥆e no𞥅n wa𞥄wa𞥄 fawa𞥄de e warde ho𞥅re doga yhee𞥅wa mo𞥅ldho dhum, o wa𞥄wi fawa𞥄de tan ko e jamiro𞥅je fed𞥆e leyadhe𞥅le dentudhe.
Ku𞥅lal 15
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e jeyae𞥅de e leyadi, woni joga𞥄de n'gen𞥆di.
Haya go𞥅to wa𞥄wa𞥄 e dow bela𞥄dhe hadhe𞥅de joga𞥄de n'gen𞥆di wal𞥆a wayalude n'gen𞥆 di.
Ku𞥅lal 16

CHag𞥆al n'de nedh𞥆o danyai𞥅 du𞥅bhi kel𞥆ituyaa so ko o deb𞥆o, so ko o gorko falta𞥄 ki lenyaol, n'guru, leyadi ono jogi hak𞥆e resde ma𞥄 rese𞥅de, o darna fo𞥅yare. Ko kambhe poti he𞥅n hak𞥆e𞥅ji jowiti𞥅dhi e dewgal so ina hume𞥅 wal𞥆a so ina it𞥆e𞥅 (go𞥅rko e dewbo).
Dewgal fawi𞥅 ko e yaidhde resondire𞥅bho dhidho bhe𞥅 wona𞥄 ina fawe𞥅 e wa𞥄wnere.
bhesngo ko kam woni tergal gadanal e n'der rendo bhesngu inajogi𞥅 hak𞥆e n'de𞥅nka im𞥆ora𞥄de e ren𞥆do kam e la𞥄mu leyadi n'di𞥅.
Ku𞥅lal 17
Kala nedh𞥆o wal𞥆a dental yaimbh e ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e e jeyaal leyadi.
Haya go𞥅to fota𞥄ni e amdu e wa𞥄wde hadhe𞥅de jeyai mum.
Ku𞥅lal 18

Kala nedh𞥆o ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e n'dima𞥄gu mi𞥅jo, hak𞥆ilanta𞥄gal kam e di𞥅ne. O𞥅n hak𞥆e ina ro𞥅ndi𞥅 n'dima𞥄gu wayalude di𞥅ne kam e n'dima𞥄gu tabitinde di𞥅ne mum wal𞥆a yai yaan𞥆de mum kanyaum go𞥅to wal𞥆a e wondude e wodhbhe. N'ga𞥄l tabitinal di𞥅ne no𞥅n ina nona ko dhu𞥅dhi𞥅 e ko fe𞥅nyai fof tawa ko rewne𞥅de e dow jande⹁ wal𞥆a dewal wal𞥆a jamiro𞥅je di𞥅na kan.
Ku𞥅lal 19

Nedh𞥆o ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e e n'dima𞥄gu joga𞥄de mi𞥅jo e sa𞥄ktude mi𞥅jo mum dhum firti ko jo𞥅m mum fota𞥄mi hulde fe𞥅nyaninde mi𞥅jo mum wal𞥆a widhtude, hebhde kam e sarde mi𞥅jo𞥅ji e kabavu𞥅ji tawa woyhea𞥄ki ke𞥅ri hak𞥆unde leyadhe𞥅le e no sarda𞥄 fof.
Ku𞥅lal 20
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e e n'dima𞥄gu wadhde batu wal𞥆a fed𞥆e n'de wona𞥄 fitina.
Haya go𞥅to fota𞥄ni wa𞥄wne𞥅de jeyae𞥅de e fed𞥆e alaya sago.
Ku𞥅lal 21
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e e jeyae𞥅de e terdhe gardi𞥅dhe leyadi mum. Tawa ko kanyaum e ho𞥅re mum wal𞥆a tawa ko wa𞥄ba𞥄de e bhe yaimbhe e chubhi𞥅 ina n'jo𞥅dh anyai𞥅 leyadi sabu jonyae𞥅de gedhe mum.
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e ardine𞥅de wal𞥆a jonyae𞥅de gedhe/gol𞥆e leyadi e dow potal.

Mu𞥅yaa𞥄nde leyadi n'di𞥅 ko nyaibhgol kalfa𞥄ndi la𞥄mu𞥅ji dhi𞥅. N'di𞥅n kalfa𞥄ndi nyaibhorto𞥅 tan sosde wo𞥅te𞥅ji chubho𞥅 subhngo la𞥄bhngo e leyadi kala, tawa chubhoto𞥅 dho kala ina tot𞥆e𞥅 n'dima𞥄gu mum tim𞥆ungu.
Ku𞥅lal 22

Nedh𞥆o kala e n'der ren𞥆do ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e e n'de𞥅n ka ren𞥆doyaanke𞥅wo. dhumko welta𞥄re hak𞥆e𞥅ji fag𞥆uduyaankoj e ren𞥆doyaan he𞥅ji e pina yaanko𞥅ji katojina𞥄 dhi e n'dima𞥄gu e bhamta𞥄re a𞥄de e dow tu𞥅ga𞥄de e n'gonka leyadi fof.
Ku𞥅lal 23
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e lig𞥆a𞥄de e dow potal huj𞥆ia𞥄ji lig𞥆e𞥅ya e n'de𞥅nka ba𞥄sgol gol𞥆a𞥄de.
YAimbhe fof poti fotde n'jobhdi so tawi𞥅 bhe poti𞥅 lig𞥆e𞥅ya.

Kala lig𞥆idho ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e n'jobh di fotndi he𞥅n, n'jondiN'ba𞥄wndi joga𞥄de mo kanko e bhesngu mak𞥆oN'bele n'jogo𞥅 n'gonka moyhe𞥆a ted𞥆uka. N'jobhdi ina ha𞥄ni tim𞥆inire𞥅de chati𞥅dhe ren𞥆doyaanko𞥅je.
Nedh𞥆o kala lig𞥆oto𞥅dho ina jogi𞥅 la𞥄wol tafde fed𞥆e wul𞥆ita𞥄re hak𞥆eji lig𞥆e𞥅ya wal𞥆a yaantondirde fed𞥆e lig𞥆oto𞥅bhe mum e pedle godh𞥆e lig𞥆oto𞥅bhe so tawi edhe n'den𞥆di n'goyhe a𞥄ji e an𞥆iyaa.
Ku𞥅lal 24
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi hak𞥆e e fo𞥅ftere wal𞥆a weltinde bhernde num wal𞥆a wo𞥅da dho ha𞥄’dhni lig𞥆e𞥅ya mum ete kala lig𞥆oto𞥅dho ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e e fo𞥅ftere yaobh ete𞥅nde.
Ku𞥅lal 25

Nedh𞥆 kala ino foti joga𞥄de hak𞥆e n'gu𞥅rndam chemordham ha𞥄 wa𞥄wa𞥄 top𞥆ita𞥄de chel𞥆al mum, n'gonka mum eka bhesngu mum ha𞥄 te𞥅ngti e n'gu𞥅ra, kodhlchi, safa𞥄ra e gedhe ren𞥆do; omo jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e e n'de𞥅nka so tawi𞥅 o lig𞥆a𞥄ki, wal𞥆a o sel𞥆a𞥄ni ma wal𞥆a o jodta𞥄 de e do𞥅le mum, wal𞥆a kes jo𞥅dhi𞥅dho, nayawudho wal𞥆a kala gedhe ba𞥄so𞥅je wal𞥆itde n'gu𞥅ra dhe pawa𞥄ki e bel𞥆ante𞥅je.
Jibina𞥄dho deb𞥆o e suka𞥄ku ina n'jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e bal𞥆al e top𞥆ita𞥄gol ke𞥅ri𞥅dhi. Suka𞥄bhe fof, woni a jibina𞥄bhe e n'der dewgal wal𞥆a chag𞥆al dewgal poti fotde to ban𞥆ge n'de𞥅nka ren𞥆doyaanke𞥅wo.
Ku𞥅lal 26

Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e jangde jangde foti wonde ko n'de ala𞥄 n'jobhdi haya sin𞥆a ko to arwani𞥅re e gadanal. Jangde suka𞥄bhe ina foti wonde alaya sago. Jangde karal𞥆a𞥄gal ina foti hubhtidin’de: jangde to𞥅wnde ina foti ud𞥆itana𞥄de moni kala taw ala𞥄 he𞥅di-he𞥅da, tawa ko e ba𞥄wal mum.

jande foti ko fe𞥅rtinde nedh𞥆anka𞥄gal⹁ bheyada ted𞥆in’de hak𞥆e𞥅ji in𞥆ama A𞥄de𞥅, hebhde ho𞥅re mum. Ina foti wa𞥄litde pa𞥄mondiral⹁ munyaundiral, chehila𞥄galhak𞥆unde leyadhe𞥅le e kala sen𞥆go𞥅ji leyhe𞥆i wal𞥆a di𞥅ne𞥅ji, fawiti𞥅 he𞥅n bhamta𞥄re gol𞥆e dowla𞥄ji dentudhi n'gam moyhe𞥆ere ina du𞥅mo𞥅.
Jibina𞥄bhe ina poti subha𞥄de hol fan𞥆u jangde n'dok𞥆ata suk𞥆a𞥄bhe mumen.
Ku𞥅lal 27
Nedh𞥆o kala ina wa𞥄wi e sago mum jeyae𞥅de e bhamtugol pinal ren𞥆de mum, hu𞥅toro𞥅 nyae𞥅nyae e wal𞥆itde bhamta𞥄re gan𞥆daliyaanke𞥅wal e kala bhure jalto𞥅je he𞥅n.
Nedh𞥆o kala ina jogi𞥅 hak𞥆e n'de𞥅nka mu𞥅yaa𞥄dhe mum to ban𞥆ge nedh𞥆anka𞥄gal e jawdhi tu𞥅gi𞥅dhe e bhulgo gan𞥆dal, chonyache, nyae𞥅nyaal dhe o tafi.
Ku𞥅lal 28

Nedh𞥆o kala ene foti darana𞥄de nyaibhagol hak𞥆e𞥅ji in𞥆ama a𞥄de𞥅 kam e n'di ma𞥄gu mum to ban𞥆ge ren𞥆do e n'der win𞥆dereN'bele ku𞥅le ka𞥄la𞥄dhe ender n'galdho nanondiral n'jet𞥆o fa𞥄nda𞥄re todh𞥆a𞥄nde n'de.
Ku𞥅lal 29
In𞥆ama a𞥄de𞥅 ina jogi𞥅 huj𞥆a𞥄ji fayade e ren𞥆do n'go n'gan𞥆dudha𞥄ko bhamta𞥄re hu𞥅bhtidinde nedh𞥆anka𞥄gal mak𞥆o tan wa𞥄wi wo𞥅tde.

E n'der ku𞥅torogol hak𞥆e𞥅ji mak𞥆o kam e naftorogol n'dima𞥄gu mak𞥆o, moni kala fawa𞥄 e mum tan ko dho𞥅ftogol sardhiyae𞥅ji n'gam te𞥅ngtin’de keftingol e nehtanagol hak𞥆e𞥅jie wodbhe n'gam tim𞥆inde nedh𞥆ang ka𞥄galngam gedhe den𞥆da𞥄nde kam e n'gonka moyhe𞥆a ku𞥅bhtidindho n'gam danyaje ren𞥆do potal.
DHi𞥅 hak𞥆e𞥅ji e n'gu𞥅 n'dima𞥄guN'ba𞥄wa danyae𞥅de e dow lu𞥅nda𞥄re pa𞥄nda𞥄le𞥅 mu𞥅yaa𞥄be dowla𞥄ji dentudhi.
Ku𞥅lal 30

Haya ku𞥅lal go𞥅tal gum𞥆ingal e n'gal dho nanon’diral fota𞥄ni jag𞥆ire𞥅de um𞥆i𞥅 ko e leyadi, wal𞥆a dental ke𞥅ringal, wal𞥆a nedh𞥆o ke𞥅ri𞥅dho. Haya nedh𞥆o go𞥅to, wal𞥆a dental wal𞥆a leyadi pota𞥄ni joga𞥄de gol𞥆e tawa fa𞥄nda𞥄re mumen ko firtude hak𞥆e𞥅jie e n'dima𞥄gu kala𞥄dhi e n'der nanondiral n'gal.
